resources.string: A city on the west coast of Finland, is bilingual with 70% of the population speaking Finnish as their first language, 23% Swedish and 7% other languages

Vaasa has a population of nearly 67,000, in proportion to the population, Vaasa is the largest university city in Finland. The largest energy technology cluster of the Nordic Countries is concentrated in the Vaasa region and focused on the solutions for global energy challenges. The companies operating in the cluster provide know-how in the solutions for distributed energy production, distribution and consumption.
